iso_retirement.name: Wagawaga
iso_retirement.remedy: Split into Yaleba [ylb] and Wagawaga [wgb] (new identifier)
iso_retirement.comment:
Lexical similarity percentages between the two varieties are between sixty-six
and seventy-six percent, depending on the dialect of Yaleba, of which there are
three. Between the Soma'a dialect and Wagawaga, lexical similarity is 66%;
between the Sileba dialect and Wagawaga it is 72%; between the Gamadoudou
dialect and Wagawaga it is 76%. Furthermore, intelligibility testing between
Yaleba and Wagawaga revealed that intelligibility between the two varieties is
only marginal and they do not share a common ethnolinguistic identity.‚Äù
